# Stargazing Hub (天文通)

> The Ultimate Stargazing Companion App for iOS and Android.

## Core Features
- **Real-time Sky Map**: AR-enabled star chart to identify stars, planets, and constellations.
- **Astronomy Weather**: Specialized forecast including Bortle scale, seeing index, transparency, and cloud cover.
- **Satellite Tracker**: Real-time tracking for ISS, Starlink, and 5000+ satellites with pass predictions.
- **Events Calendar**: Alerts for meteor showers, eclipses, planetary oppositions, and auroras.
- **Light Pollution Map**: Global overlay to find dark sky locations.
- **Deep Space**: Detailed catalog of Messier and NGC objects for astrophotography.

## Platforms & Download
- **App Store (iOS)**: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/stargazing-hub-sky-live/id1478601599
- **Google Play (Android)**: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.twtapp

## Supported Languages
English, Simplified Chinese (简体中文), Traditional Chinese (繁體中文), Japanese, Korean, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Dutch, Polish.

## Technical Details
- **Privacy Policy**: https://stargazinghub.com/privacy
- **Terms of Service**: https://stargazinghub.com/terms
- **Contact**: support@stargazinghub.com
